text:
**Public Round**

Starting October 1st, right after the FUND listing on DeDust, the official Public Round begins.
Three months of open sales for everyone, with fixed price growth and equal participation rules.

**October ‚Üí December = three months of growth**
  ‚Ä¢  October ‚Äî 1 TON/FUND
  ‚Ä¢  November ‚Äî 2 TON/FUND
  ‚Ä¢  December ‚Äî 4 TON/FUND

**Purchase mechanics**Purchase mechanics
  ‚Ä¢  You can send any amount of TON.
  ‚Ä¢  Your order fills step by step: 10 TON every 10 minutes per address.
  ‚Ä¢  In total for all users, only 100 TON every 10 minutes are processed.
  ‚Ä¢  The earlier you send, the sooner your FUND arrives.

**Example**
You send 50 TON in October.
Every 10 minutes you receive 10 TON worth of FUND ‚Üí in 50 minutes your full deposit is settled at 1 TON/FUND.
If you send later than others, you‚Äôll wait in the queue.

**Guarantees & bonuses**
  ‚Ä¢  Only FUND bought from the official address (Oct 1 ‚Äì Dec 31) comes with a 100% ReFUND guarantee: within one year you can return TON at the click of a button
  ‚Ä¢  Holders and liquidity providers will be eligible for bonuses up to 1% daily

__From January 1, 2026, the Perpetual Round begins ‚Äî a continuous auction starting at 4 TON/FUND, distributing tokens over the long term.__
